mapper.select: SELECT GUID as "guid", WSNAME as "wsname", INTFGUID as "intfguid", WSTYPE as "wstype", SENDSOURCE as "sendsource", PRAMDATA as "pramdata", RECODE as "recode", RECONTENT as "recontent", SENDTIME as "sendtime", RETIME as "retime" FROM T_SYS_WSLOG
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_WSLOG ( GUID, WSNAME, INTFGUID, WSTYPE, SENDSOURCE, PRAMDATA, RECODE, RECONTENT, SENDTIME, RETIME ) VALUES ( #{guid, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{wsname, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{intfguid, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{wstype, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{sendsource, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{pramdata, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{recode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{recontent, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{sendtime, jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=DateHandler}, #{retime, jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=DateHandler} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SYS_WSLOG
GUID = #{guid},
WSNAME = #{wsname},
INTFGUID = #{intfguid},
WSTYPE = #{wstype},
SENDSOURCE = #{sendsource},
PRAMDATA = #{pramdata},
RECODE = #{recode},
RECONTENT = #{recontent},
SENDTIME = #{sendtime},
RETIME = #{retime}
